diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,122 @@
+package(default_visibility = ["//tensorflow:internal"])
+
+licenses(["notice"])  # Apache 2.0
+
+exports_files(["LICENSE"])
+
+load(
+    "//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl",
+    "tf_custom_op_library",
+    "tf_custom_op_py_library",
+    "tf_gen_op_libs",
+    "tf_gen_op_wrapper_py",
+    "tf_kernel_library",
+    "tf_py_test",
+)
+
+filegroup(
+    name = "test_data",
+    srcs = glob(["python/kernel_tests/testdata/*"]),
+)
+
+py_library(
+    name = "parquet",
+    srcs = ["__init__.py"],
+    srcs_version = "PY2AND3",
+    deps = [
+        ":dataset_ops",
+    ],
+)
+
+tf_custom_op_library(
+    name = "_dataset_ops.so",
+    srcs = ["ops/dataset_ops.cc"],
+    deps = [
+        ":dataset_kernels",
+    ],
+)
+
+tf_gen_op_libs(
+    op_lib_names = ["dataset_ops"],
+)
+
+cc_library(
+    name = "dataset_kernels",
+    srcs = ["kernels/parquet_dataset_ops.cc"],
+    copts = [
+    ],
+    deps = [
+        "//tensorflow/core:framework_headers_lib",
+        "//third_party/eigen3",
+        "@parquet",
+        "@protobuf_archive//:protobuf_headers",
+    ],
+    alwayslink = 1,
+)
+
+py_library(
+    name = "dataset_ops",
+    srcs = [
+        "python/ops/parquet_dataset_ops.py",
+    ],
+    srcs_version = "PY2AND3",
+    deps = [
+        ":parquet_op_loader",
+        "//tensorflow/python:dataset_ops_gen",
+        "//tensorflow/python:util",
+        "//tensorflow/python/data/ops:dataset_ops",
+        "//tensorflow/python/data/util:nest",
+    ],
+)
+
+tf_gen_op_wrapper_py(
+    name = "gen_dataset_ops",
+    out = "python/ops/gen_dataset_ops.py",
+    deps = ["//tensorflow/contrib/parquet:dataset_ops_op_lib"],
+)
+
+tf_kernel_library(
+    name = "dataset_ops_kernels",
+    deps = [
+        ":dataset_kernels",
+        "//tensorflow/core:framework",
+    ],
+    alwayslink = 1,
+)
+
+tf_custom_op_py_library(
+    name = "parquet_op_loader",
+    srcs = ["python/ops/parquet_op_loader.py"],
+    dso = ["//tensorflow/contrib/parquet:_dataset_ops.so"],
+    kernels = [
+        ":dataset_ops_kernels",
+        "//tensorflow/contrib/parquet:dataset_ops_op_lib",
+    ],
+    srcs_version = "PY2AND3",
+    deps = [
+        ":gen_dataset_ops",
+        "//tensorflow/contrib/util:util_py",
+        "//tensorflow/python:platform",
+    ],
+)
+
+tf_py_test(
+    name = "parquet_test",
+    srcs = ["python/kernel_tests/parquet_test.py"],
+    additional_deps = [
+        ":parquet",
+        "//third_party/py/numpy",
+        "//tensorflow/python:client_testlib",
+        "//tensorflow/python:framework",
+        "//tensorflow/python:framework_test_lib",
+        "//tensorflow/python:platform_test",
+    ],
+    data = [
+        ":test_data",
+    ],
+    tags = [
body: Thanks @skye. The tag use `no_pip` as test data needs not to be in pip, also I disabled windows with `no_windows`.
